About Us

Welcome to
EFI Pro Painting

EFI ProPainting is a full-service painting contractor specializing in interior & exterior painting and waterproofing of residential & commercial properties. With a presence in the South Florida market for 15 years, in addition to residential repaints, we specialize in painting high-rise and mid-rise buildings, townhouse and condominium projects, apartment communities, shopping centers, office building, hotels and hospitals.
